metadata.name: HackTool - KrbRelay Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of KrbRelay, a Kerberos relaying tool

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\krbrelay.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('krbrelay.exe') OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -spn ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -clsid ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -rbcd ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shadowcred')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('clsid')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spn')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spn ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('session ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('clsid '))))

output.summary: Detects the use of KrbRelay, a Kerberos relaying tool
